meanings.definition: Relating to or serving as a trial or test period.
meanings.sent1: During the probational phase, the new employee will be closely monitored.
meanings.sent2: The company offers a probational period to assess the skills of new hires.
meanings.sent3: The probational period felt like a challenging adventure for the trainee.
meanings.sent4: Her probational performance was a shining beacon of dedication.
meanings.sent5: The probational period was a crucial step in determining the employee's capabilities.
